ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cncrng | |- CCfld e. CRing |
| 2 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( CCfld e. CRing -> CCfld e. Ring ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ringmnd | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Mnd ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2b | |- CCfld e. Mnd |
| 5 |  | #P_0re | |- 0 e. RR |
| 6 |  | #P_axresscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 7 |  | #P_df-refld | |- RRfld = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_ress0g | |- ( ( CCfld e. Mnd /\ 0 e. RR /\ RR C_ CC ) -> 0 = ( 0g ` RRfld ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 5, 6, 10 | #P_mp3an | |- 0 = ( 0g ` RRfld ) |
